wikipedia_page.main:
Rachael Solomon (Married name Rachael Evans, born Rachael Jones) is a Welsh actress, singer, choreographer and television presenter.
Solomon, originally from St Asaph, is an in-vision continuity announcer for Cyw (previously Planed Plant Bach), S4C's service for young children.Prior to this, she was a singer with the Welsh pop group Eden alongside Emma Walford & Non Parry and appeared as Jaci Roberts in the HTV drama series for Welsh learners, Talk About Welsh, between 1996 and 2001.
